record.title: ORDER FOR MEASURE TO BE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 6304
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR MEASURE TO BE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 6304 -- (Senate - June 20, 2008)

[Page: S5947]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when H.R. 6304 is received from the House, it be placed on the calendar.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
